titles.title: The Lord Thy God In The Midst (Zepheniah 3:17)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Lord Thy God in the midst of thee Is mighty, is mighty. He will save, He will rejoice over thee With joy, with joy.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He will rest in His love, He will joy over thee with singing. The Lord Thy God in the midst of thee Is mighty, is mighty, is mighty.{/lang-eng}
